icon_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <!-- Standard-Pinform, zentriert bei x=20 -->
  <path
    d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
    fill="#16a085"
  />
  <!-- Wei√üer Kreis -->
  <circle cx="20" cy="14" r="5.5" fill="#ffffff" />
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#ff9800"
      stroke-width="1.5"
    />

    <!-- Kreis-Hintergrund -->
    <circle
      cx="20"
      cy="16"
      r="9"
      fill="#ff9800"
      stroke="#ff9800"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Leuchtturm ‚Äì Turm-K√∂rper -->
    <rect
      x="17.2"
      y="12.8"
      width="5.6"
      height="8.8"
      rx="1"
      ry="1"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Leuchtturm ‚Äì Galerie (kleiner Ring oben) -->
    <rect
      x="16.4"
      y="12"
      width="7.2"
      height="1"
      rx="0.5"
      ry="0.5"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Leuchtturm ‚Äì Laternenhaus -->
    <rect
      x="18.2"
      y="10.6"
      width="3.6"
      height="1.8"
      rx="0.5"
      ry="0.5"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Leuchtturm ‚Äì Dach (kleines Dreieck) -->
    <path
      d="M20 9.2 L17.6 10.4 H22.4 Z"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- T√ºr -->
    <rect
      x="19"
      y="16.2"
      width="2"
      height="3"
      rx="0.6"
      ry="0.6"
      fill="#ff9800"
    />

    <!-- Lichtstrahl links -->
    <path
      d="M16.2 11.4 L13.4 10.5"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />
    <path
      d="M16.2 13.0 L13.1 13.0"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />

    <!-- Lichtstrahl rechts -->
    <path
      d="M23.8 11.4 L26.6 10.5"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />
    <path
      d="M23.8 13.0 L26.9 13.0"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#9e9e9e"
      stroke-width="1.3"
    />

    <!-- Grauer Kreis -->
    <circle
      cx="20"
      cy="16"
      r="11"
      fill="#9e9e9e"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#2c3e50"
    />

    <!-- Wei√üer Kreis als B√ºhne f√ºr das Icon -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="14" r="8" fill="#ffffff" />

    <!-- Stern-Symbol f√ºr Touristenattraktion -->
    <path
      d="M20 8.8
         21.8 12.1
         25.4 12.6
         22.7 14.9
         23.3 18.4
         20 16.7
         16.7 18.4
         17.3 14.9
         14.6 12.6
         18.2 12.1
         Z"
      fill="#2c3e50"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

name_it: negozio di articoli per la casa

icon_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <!-- Alles in einer Gruppe, damit fill-rule & Co. konsistent sind -->
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund mit feiner Kontur -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#d0d0d0"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Roter Kreis im Pin -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="11" fill="#e53935" />

    <!-- Zapfs√§ule (wei√ü) -->
    <!-- S√§ulen-K√∂rper -->
    <rect
      x="15.5"
      y="11.5"
      width="9"
      height="11"
      rx="1.2"
      ry="1.2"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="0.6"
    />

    <!-- Fenster -->
    <rect x="17.4" y="13.2" width="4.2" height="3.1" fill="#e53935" />

    <!-- Basis -->
    <rect x="14.5" y="22.1" width="11" height="2.2" fill="#ffffff" />

    <!-- Zapfhahn-Kopf -->
    <rect
      x="22.7"
      y="11.7"
      width="2.2"
      height="2.7"
      rx="0.5"
      ry="0.5"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Schlauch -->
    <path
      d="M24.1 13.6c1 0 1.8.8 1.8 1.8v4.2c0 1-.5 1.7-1.4 1.7H23"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.3"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

name_it: Ufficio locale della Capitaneria di porto
icon_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#5dade2"
      stroke-width="1.5"
    />
    <!-- Farbkreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="8" fill="#5dade2" />

    <!-- Geb√§ude (ohne Flagge) -->
    <rect
      x="15"
      y="15"
      width="10"
      height="5"
      rx="0.8"
      ry="0.8"
      fill="none"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.4"
    />
    <path
      d="M14.5 15 L20 11.5 25.5 15"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.4"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
      fill="none"
    />
    <line x1="17" y1="15.2" x2="17" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="20" y1="15.2" x2="20" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="23" y1="15.2" x2="23" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <!-- Welle unten -->
    <path
      d="M15 20.7c1 .6 2 .6 3 0 1 .6 2 .6 3 0 1 .6 2 .6 3 0"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      fill="none"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <!-- Alles minimal verkleinert und zentriert, damit nichts beschnitten wird -->
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" transform="translate(2 1) scale(0.9)">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund (Standard-Form) -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#c0392b"
    />
    <!-- Wei√üer Kreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="14" r="5.5" fill="#ffffff" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund mit feiner Kontur -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#d0d0d0"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Dunkler Kreis als Hintergrund -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="11" fill="#455a64" />

    <!-- Schraubenschl√ºssel: extrem simple, pixel-sicher -->
    <!-- Schaft -->
    <rect
      x="13"
      y="8.9"
      width="14"
      height="2.8"
      rx="1.4"
      ry="1.4"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- K√∂pfe links & rechts (Donuts) -->
    <circle cx="13" cy="10.3" r="2.2" fill="#ffffff" />
    <circle cx="27" cy="10.3" r="2.2" fill="#ffffff" />
    <circle cx="13" cy="10.3" r="1.1" fill="#455a64" />
    <circle cx="27" cy="10.3" r="1.1" fill="#455a64" />

    <!-- Auto-Front (bewusst simpel gehalten) -->
    <path
      d="
        M13.3 14.9
        h13.4
        c.8 0 1.4.5 1.7 1.3
        l1.1 3.3
        c.2.6-.2 1.2-.9 1.2
        h-1.2
        v1.9
        c0 .6-.4 1-1 1
        h-1
        c-.6 0-1-.4-1-1v-1.9
        h-7.8
        v1.9
        c0 .6-.4 1-1 1
        h-1
        c-.6 0-1-.4-1-1v-1.9
        h-1.2
        c-.7 0-1.1-.6-.9-1.2
        l1.1-3.3
        c.3-.8.9-1.3 1.7-1.3
        z
      "
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Windschutzscheibe -->
    <path
      d="
        M14.7 15.7
        h10.6
        c.5 0 .9.3 1.1.8
        l.7 2
        h-14.2
        l.7-2
        c.2-.5.6-.8 1.1-.8
        z
      "
      fill="#455a64"
    />

    <!-- Scheinwerfer -->
    <circle cx="16.3" cy="20.2" r="1.3" fill="#ffffff" />
    <circle cx="23.7" cy="20.2" r="1.3" fill="#ffffff" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#e67e22"
    />

    <!-- Wei√üer Kreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="14" r="8" fill="#ffffff" />

    <!-- Teller -->
    <circle cx="18" cy="14" r="4.2" stroke="#e67e22" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <circle cx="18" cy="14" r="2" fill="#e67e22" />

    <!-- Glas -->
    <path
      d="M23 10.5
         h4
         l-0.3 2.8
         c-0.2 1.6 -1.2 2.6 -2 2.6
         c-0.8 0 -1.8 -1 -2 -2.6
         Z"
      fill="#e67e22"
    />
    <rect x="24.2" y="13.3" width="1.6" height="4" fill="#e67e22" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">

    />

    <!-- WEISSER KREIS (STANDARDPOSITION) -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="8" fill="#ffffff"/>

    <!-- HAUS -->
    <!-- Dach -->

      d="M16 16 L20 13 L24 16"
      stroke="#7f8c8d"
      stroke-width="1.7"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
    />

    <!-- Hausk√∂rper -->
    <rect
      x="16.7"
      y="16"
      width="6.6"
      height="5.5"
      rx="0.8"
      ry="0.8"
      fill="none"
      stroke="#7f8c8d"
      stroke-width="1.6"
    />

    <!-- T√ºr -->
    <rect
      x="19"
      y="17.6"
      width="2"
      height="3.6"
      rx="0.5"
      ry="0.5"
      fill="#7f8c8d"
    />

  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#1f6aa2"
      stroke-width="1.5"
    />
    <!-- Farbkreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="8" fill="#1f6aa2" />

    <!-- Geb√§ude mit Dach + Flagge -->
    <!-- Sockel -->
    <rect
      x="15"
      y="15"
      width="10"
      height="5"
      rx="0.8"
      ry="0.8"
      fill="none"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.4"
    />
    <!-- Dach -->
    <path
      d="M14.5 15 L20 11.5 25.5 15"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.4"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
      fill="none"
    />
    <!-- S√§ulen -->
    <line x1="17" y1="15.2" x2="17" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="20" y1="15.2" x2="20" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="23" y1="15.2" x2="23" y2="19.5" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <!-- Flagge oben -->
    <path
      d="M20 11.5 L20 9.8 L22.3 10.4 L20 11.0"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="0.8"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
    />
    <!-- Welle unten -->
    <path
      d="M15 20.7c1 .6 2 .6 3 0 1 .6 2 .6 3 0 1 .6 2 .6 3 0"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.2"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      fill="none"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <!-- Alles in einer Gruppe, damit fill-rule & Co. konsistent sind -->
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#005b96"
      stroke-width="1.5"
    />

    <!-- Blauer Kreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="11" fill="#005b96" />

    <!-- Poller: Basis -->
    <line
      x1="13"
      y1="20.5"
      x2="27"
      y2="20.5"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />

    <!-- Poller: linker Fu√ü -->
    <line
      x1="17"
      y1="20.5"
      x2="17"
      y2="16"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />

    <!-- Poller: rechter Fu√ü -->
    <line
      x1="23"
      y1="20.5"
      x2="23"
      y2="16"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />

    <!-- Poller: Kopf / Pfahl -->
    <rect
      x="17"
      y="12"
      width="6"
      height="4"
      rx="1.2"
      ry="1.2"
      fill="none"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
    />

    <!-- Leine (um den Poller gewickelt) -->
    <path
      d="M14.5 15.2 L24.5 17 L14.5 18.8"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
    />

    <!-- Leinenende -->
    <line
      x1="23.5"
      y1="18.8"
      x2="26"
      y2="19.4"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.6"
      stroke-linecap="round"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund mit feiner Kontur -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#d0d0d0"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Blaue Tafel -->
    <rect
      x="11"
      y="7"
      width="18"
      height="18"
      rx="2.5"
      ry="2.5"
      fill="#0d47a1"
    />

    <!-- Wei√üe Innenfl√§che -->
    <rect
      x="13.5"
      y="9.5"
      width="13"
      height="13"
      fill="#ffffff"
    />

    <!-- Rotes Kreuz ‚Äì vertikaler Balken -->
    <rect
      x="19"
      y="9.5"
      width="3"
      height="13"
      fill="#e53935"
    />

    <!-- Rotes Kreuz ‚Äì horizontaler Balken -->
    <rect
      x="13.5"
      y="14.7"
      width="13"
      height="3"
      fill="#e53935"
    />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund + feine Kontur -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#d0d0d0"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Blauer Kreis -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="16" r="11" fill="#1976d2" />

    <!-- Stethoskop Bogen ‚Äì linkes Ohr -->
    <path
      d="M15.2 11.2
         a3 3 0 0 0 0 5.8"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.8"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      fill="none"
    />

    <!-- Stethoskop Bogen ‚Äì rechtes Ohr -->
    <path
      d="M24.8 11.2
         a3 3 0 0 1 0 5.8"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.8"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      fill="none"
    />

    <!-- Verbindung nach unten -->
    <path
      d="M15.2 17
         c0 4.2 2 6.3 4.8 6.3
         s4.8-2.1 4.8-6.3"
      stroke="#ffffff"
      stroke-width="1.8"
      stroke-linecap="round"
      fill="none"
    />

    <!-- Brustst√ºck au√üen -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="23.7" r="2.2" fill="#ffffff" />

    <!-- Brustst√ºck innen -->
    <circle cx="20" cy="23.7" r="1.1" fill="#1976d2" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="40" height="40" viewBox="0 0 40 40">
  <g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <!-- Pin-Hintergrund mit feiner Kontur -->
    <path
      d="M20 2c-7.18 0-13 5.82-13 13 0 8.28 13 23 13 23s13-14.72 13-23C33 7.82 27.18 2 20 2z"
      fill="#ffffff"
      stroke="#d0d0d0"
      stroke-width="1"
    />

    <!-- Apotheker-Gr√ºn -->
    <g stroke="#2e7d32" fill="#2e7d32" stroke-width="0.5">
      <!-- Schale -->
      <path
        d="M13.5 15.5h13
           c-.3 2.1-2.1 3.6-6.5 3.6s-6.2-1.5-6.5-3.6z"
        fill="#2e7d32"
        stroke-linejoin="round"
      />

      <!-- Stiel -->
      <rect
        x="19"
        y="19.1"
        width="2"
        height="4.8"
        rx="0.7"
        ry="0.7"
      />

      <!-- Fu√ü -->
      <path
        d="M17 24.5h6
           c-.4 1.3-1.4 2.1-3 2.1s-2.6-.8-3-2.1z"
      />

      <!-- Schlange: Kopf + gewundener K√∂rper um den Stiel -->
      <!-- Kopf -->
      <circle cx="24.4" cy="11.2" r="1.1" />

      <!-- Auge -->
      <circle cx="24.7" cy="11.0" r="0.18" fill="#ffffff" stroke="none" />

      <!-- Zunge (kleiner Strich) -->
      <path
        d="M25.1 11.6l0.9 0.5"
        stroke="#2e7d32"
        stroke-width="0.35"
        stroke-linecap="round"
        fill="none"
      />

      <!-- K√∂rper ‚Äì vereinfachte S-Kurve um den Stiel -->
      <path
        d="
          M24.4 11.3
          C22.0 11.3 20.7 12.2 20.7 13.5
          C20.7 14.8 21.7 15.5 23.4 15.7
          L24.6 15.8

          C26.4 16.0 27.3 16.8 27.3 18.1
          C27.3 19.6 25.8 20.6 23.6 20.6
          L21.4 20.6

          C19.7 20.6 18.8 21.2 18.8 22.3
          C18.8 23.5 19.7 24.2 21.1 24.4
        "
        fill="none"
        stroke-linecap="round"
        stroke-linejoin="round"
        stroke-width="1.6"
      />
    </g>
  </g>
</svg>
